document.full_text: a u.s. judge on wednesday dealt a setback to a lesbian federal employee's bid to obtain health insurance for her same-sex spouse, according to a court ruling.
document.title: lesbian u.s. employee set back in benefits fight
lines_and_colors: a u.s. judge on wednesday dealt a setback to a lesbian federal employee's bid to obtain health insurance for her same-sex spouse, according to a court ruling.
